name: Misfortunate Tadpole
description:
Stuck in a water bubble after having been thrown up among the treetops by a storm, this little tadpole now has to navigate through the leaves and branches to find his way back home in this one-button platformer.

Use your momentum and time your jumps to complete the different levels, and seek refuge within the lotus flowers. However, be wary of the effects the platforms and other obstacles have on your bubble. You wouldn’t want it to pop!

There are also stars to gather, sprinkled throughout for an added challenge. Get them all for the satisfaction of completion!

Controls: 

 Spacebar - Jump.
